result.eng: The death penalty was abolished in 1976.
result.ga: Ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar ceal
result.orig: Ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar ceal
result.html: Ba sa bhliain 1976 a cuireadh pionós an bháis ar cealThe death penalty was abolished in 1976.
result.ponchtml: Ba sa ḃliain 1976 a cuireaḋ pionós an ḃáis ar cealThe death penalty was abolished in 1976.

result.html: Gearradh pionós géar orthuThey were punished harshly.
result.ponchtml: Gearraḋ pionós géar orṫuThey were punished harshly.
